markdownRemark.html: On July 31, 2014 Yukihiro “Matz” Matsumoto, the creator of Ruby, gave a talk at Ninefold in San Francisco. It’s a very enlightening talk about the future of Ruby (if that wasn’t obvious from the title), as well as Matz’s new creation, mruby, an embedded lightweight Ruby comparable to the programming language Lua. Check it out: Video: Yukihiro “Matz” Matsumoto - The future of Ruby
